values.title: Making a Positive Impact
values.description: Every decision I make aims to create products that are useful, inclusive, and make a real difference. I believe design should solve problems and improve people's lives, even in small ways.

values.title: Curiosity & Iteration
values.description: I approach design with an experimental mindset, asking 'What if?' and iterating quickly to drive innovation. I value data-driven decisions that solve complex user challenges.

values.title: Collaboration & Versatility
values.description: I thrive in collaborative environments, whether working within centralised design teams or cross-functional groups. My experience across education, SaaS, and emerging tech helps me adapt quickly and bring fresh perspectives to every project.

values.title: Designing with Precision
values.description: I focus on the small things that make a big impact—whether it’s pixel-perfect UI, a seamless user flow, or ensuring consistency across a design system.

values.title: Balancing Creativity & Logic
values.description: I believe the best designs come from balancing creativity with logic. I love combining bold ideas with a solid technical foundation to create products that are beautiful, functional, and scalable.

values.title: Lifelong Learning
values.description: I love learning — whether it’s a new design approach, a coding framework, or an analytics tool. Staying adaptable helps me push my skills forward and build better experiences.
